post.body: I do my grocery shopping on line, they deliver it right to my kitchen! Produce & meats I buy local cuz I like to pick it out..

YAY!!!!! CONGRATS you guys have a GREAT WEEK TOGETHER!! Love you both Reynaldo
you know Hugh Hefner wears his PJ's everywhere! I like that idea too, especially if your PJ's are silk!
Good Morning Diana & Frankie! Love you guys! Nice day here Kelley is still sleeping but has to get up soon. PTSD Counseling

choppers and crowds have finally moved on to Market Street and I can't hear them at all now!
More choppers and I can hear the Protesters CHANTING ~ FREE! FREE! PALESTINE!
I hear choppers and sirens.. Pro-Palestinian Groups are out in force again tonight!
is wearing socks that say SUNDAY on them!
we just got the BEST HOLIDAY CALL EVER!! Thanks Sukatra!
read an article wherein a Bank Robber wrote his hold up note on a pay stub containing his name/address then left it at the scene. 20 years!
back from my walk, sipping a latte and eating a Butter Brothers Cannabis Peanut Butter cookie...Love & Peace downtown San Francisco Baby!
Kelley left for her daily constitutional. I'm going out for a latte & a small walk! Love & Peace Downtown San Francisco Baby, Reynaldo!
just learned that Toronto, Canada is the worm capital of the World! Congrats Canada!
just heard Los Angeles "Inspires twisted behavior, murder and decadence!" on the History Channel!
